name: Pebble.by – Shoppable Videos & UGC
author: pebble.by

sections.description:
Pebble is a powerful tool to create shoppable and interactive videos without impacting site speed. Easily embed in stories and carousel formats with a single line of code.

  • Add video experiences that drive sales and engagement.
  • Easily embed video experiences in stories and carousel formats fast.
  • Fast load, optimized video delivery with no impact on site speed.
  • Repurpose your Tiktok and Instagram Videos to continually drive sales.
  • Perfect for Product Demos, UGC, Video Reviews, Brand Introductions, and more.

Add a pebble to your store and increase time spent on site, engagement and conversions.
sections.installation:
Requires WooCommerce 2.3.3 or higher

Get started with our easy integration process:

Note: If you have already completed your account setup on pebble.by dashboard, you may skip step 1.

  1. Start Your Free Trial: Sign up here.
  2. Integrate with WooCommerce: In your dashboard, go to “Addons” > “WooCommerce”.
  3. Enter Details: Copy your App ID and Secret, and paste it in the Woocommerce plugin integration page.

That’s it! Your store is now connected. A purchase is required to confirm integration success.

To embed your pebble.by stories, carousel etc on your woocommerce product page need to edit the woocommerce template files. You can use Edit WooCommerce Templates plugin to edit your templates, and copy/paste the respective widget codes

1.0

  • A woocommerce plugin released to integrate with pebble.by.

1.2

  • Update release with auto insert the story/carousel to your product page
